revision.text:
The '''Gem Master''' is an [[NPCs|NPC]] in Pok√©clicker. There are two Gem Masters in Pokeclicker, one in Hoenn's Fallarbor Town, and one in Unova's Undella Town. Each Gem Master sells 6 unique [[Flutes]], purchasable with [[Gems]]. ==Shops== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Shops by region |- ! Region !! Flute Name !! Price !! Flute Name !!
